Name: CERN Document Server
Comment: CERN and HEP articles, reports, etc.

Name: mediaTUM
Comment: Repository to publish, archive and research public records, documents, images as well as research data

Name: KITopenData
Comment: Publication and archiving of research data from participating institutions

Name: RADAR4KIT
Comment: Publication and archiving of research data for researchers at KIT

Name: OpARA
Comment: Research data repository jointly operated by TU Dresden and TU Bergakademie Freiberg

Name: TUdatalib
Comment: Research data repository of TU Darmstadt

Name: DepositOnce
Comment: Research data repository of TU Berlin

Name: Digitale Bibliothek Der Publikationsserver der TU Braunschweig
Comment: Intended for publication and documentation of scientific research done at TU Braunschweig, publication of special interest collections of TU Braunschweig and regional institutions

Name: Forschungsdatenrepositorium
Comment: Research data repository for researchers at Leibniz Universität Hannover (LUH)

Name: Institutionelles Repositorium der Leibniz Universität Hannover
Comment: Institutional repository open to members and alumni of LUH

Name: GFZpublic
Comment: GFZ publishing database for books, journals, articles, etc. as well as publication records from external use of GFZ scientific literature

Name: GEO-LEO e-docs
Comment: Repository of scientific publications from the earth sciences (including grey literature and maps, amongst others)

Name: Montanportal
Comment: Information portal concerning everything about mining, raw materials, metallurgy, etc., cooperation with FiD GEO

Name: Fachinformationsdienst BAUdigital
Comment: Service is currently being set up, kick off was in September 2021

Name: fidmath
Comment: Provides a central search interface to information sources of interest to mathematicians: library catalogues, preprint servers, journals, etc.

Name: Fachinformationsdienst Kartographie und Geobasisdaten
Comment: Provides resources for research of special cartographic literature, a repository service for sharing results in the fields of cartography, history of cartography and geoinformation is currently being set up

Name: Fachinformationsdienst Mobilitäts- und Verkehrsforschung
Comment: Search interface to various sources relevant to the field of mobility and traffic research, a research data repository is currently being set up

Name: Fachinformationsdienst Materialwissenschaft und Werkstofftechnik
Comment: Integrated interface to MaterialHub and TIB search portal, service is currently being set up

Name: NFDI4Ing Terminology Service
Comment: Repository for engineering ontologies; provides API for integration in applications

Name: The Wood Database
Comment: Privately curated online database of various wood species and their characteristics, usage, etc.

Name: Material Hub
Comment: Materials research repository with partners from science and industry

Name: NOMAD Novel Materials Discovery
Comment: Provides a repository, archive and encyclopedia of novel materials, as well as an AI toolkit to facilitate research on novel materials

Name: Database of Novel and Emerging Adsorbent Materials
Comment: Database of adsorption characteristics of novel and emerging materials; includes isotherm visualisation

Name: ChemSpider
Comment: Chemical structure database; access by API requires an account with RSC

Name: Open Reaction Database
Comment: Chemical reaction database of single-step organic reactions; still in development (12/2021)

Name: Organic Syntheses
Comment: Catalogue of reliable preparations of organic compounds

Name: PubChem
Comment: The database collects information on chemical structures, physical and chemical properties, toxicity, etc.

Name: Crystallography Open Database
Comment: Open Access database of crystal structures

Name: GFZ Data Services
Comment: Research data repository for the earth and environmental sciences, accepts research data as well as scientific software

Name: PANGAEA
Publication Cost: free, but a donation of 500€ is welcome
Comment: Open Access library aimed at archiving, publishing and distributing georeferenced data from earth system research

Name: HENRY Hydraulic Engineering Repository
Comment: Repository for academic publications from the field of hydraulic engineering

Name: engrXiv
Comment: Eprint server for engineering

Name: AERADE Reports Archive
Comment: Archive of historically significant reports from the Aeronautical Research Council and the National Advisory Commitee for Aeronautics

Name: dblp computer science bibliography
Comment: Open bibliographic information focused on computer science journals and proceedings

Name: zbMATH Open
Comment: Comprehensive abstracting and reviewing service in pure and applied mathematics, also covers applications in the natural sciences, computer science, economics and engineering

Name: swMATH
Comment: Open access database about mathematical software

Hosting Institution: U.S. Department of Energy Office of Scientific and Technical Information
Name: DOE CODE
Comment: DOE CODE provides functionality for collaboration, archiving, and discovery of scientific and business software

Name: PFHub
Comment: Collection of benchmark problems to test, validate and verify phase field codes

Name: Dryad Digital Repository
Comment: Dryad is a curated general-purpose repository for research data, with a focus on biology, software submissions are published on Zenodo

Name: figshare
Comment: General-purpose repository open to all fields of science

Name: Zenodo
Comment: An open access repository for all fields of science

Name: SciELO
Comment: Bibliographic database, digital library, and electronic publishing of open access journals from Latin America, the Iberian Peninsula and South Africa

Name: SciELO Data
Comment: Multidisciplinary repository for deposition of research data published on SciELO

Hosting Institution: Centre pour la Communication Scientifique Directe
Name: HAL science ouverte
Comment: Open access repository open to all academic fields, provides access to other repositories of french universities and research centers
